item.title: Modern-ish Javascript
item.description: This post includes a few notes on ECMA language features that I like as well as some info on memory leaking. I have no doubt that it will read disjointed; I started this eons ago and only now have I decided to publish it. A simple reminder of what Node.js is …it is a set of APIs wrapped around the V8 Engine (written in c++) and is a high-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine.
